sections.title: Introduction & Context Setting
sections.goal: Understand participants' roles, responsibilities, and familiarity with Titan DR objectives
sample_questions: Could you briefly describe your role in the Titan DR drills?
What does a typical day look like for you when preparing for a DR GameDay?
How do you interact with the rest of the team during a multi-region failover simulation?

sections.title: Exploring Current DR Processes
sections.goal: Gather detailed insights into existing runbooks, tools, and coordination mechanisms
sample_questions: Walk me through RB-DR-001 Regional Failover Procedureâ€”how is it triggered and executed?
What monitoring or observability signals do you rely on to decide a failover?
How do you ensure alignment with RTO and RPO targets during drills?

sections.title: Cross-System Dependencies
sections.goal: Identify multi-hop dependencies between Titan DR and other systems like Aegis IAM or Nimbus Observability
sample_questions: Can you describe a situation where identity management or observability impacted a failover?
How do you coordinate with the Security or Data teams when a DR drill intersects their services?
What challenges arise from these interdependencies, and how do you mitigate them?

sections.title: User Experience During Drills
sections.goal: Explore how internal users (engineers, oncall staff) experience the DR process
sample_questions: From a user perspective, what are the most stressful moments during a failover?
How intuitive are the runbooks for someone new to the oncall rotation?
Are there points in the process where you think the UX could be improved?

sections.title: Decision Making & Trade-offs
sections.goal: Understand how trade-offs between cost, performance, and resilience are evaluated
sample_questions: How do you decide between a partial failover versus a full regional cutover?
What cost-related considerations influence your DR architecture decisions?
Can you give an example of a risk you accepted during a drill, and why?

sections.title: Reflection & Future Improvements
sections.goal: Gather perspectives on lessons learned and planned enhancements
sample_questions: What was the most valuable insight from TEST-DR-2025-Q1 GameDay Findings?
If you could change one thing in the current DR setup, what would it be?
How do you see the Titan DR project evolving over the next year?
